articles.title: Canada urged Biden to drop a 'Buy American' idea. Seems he's sticking to it - CBC.ca
articles.description: Canada urged U.S. President Joe Biden to drop a 'Buy American' provision on autos from his signature budget plan, but it appears he's going ahead with it. The idea is included in the newly released version of his sprawling budget plan.
articles.content:
This item is part of Watching Washington, a regular dispatch from CBC News correspondents reporting on U.S. politics and developments that affect Canadians.

articles.title: China furious as Taiwan prez says US training its troops - Hindustan Times
